message:
Hello everyone! The Timberwolves game is just 3 days away (1/23)! With that being so soon, I have some important info for everyone attending that was included in this week's email but here it is again in case you missed it:

You can still purchase tickets!! We want everyone to invite a roommate and/or a friend!! Let's make this a huge group! 
Cost: $23. Use this link to purchase your ticket: www.timberwolves.com/groupoffers
Use promo code: CRU
 
When and Where: Meet at the East Bank light rail station at 4:50pm. We will be getting on the train and leaving at 5pm sharp! 
Remember: the train leaves at 5:00 and people need to purchase tickets for the light rail before hand. Plan accordingly!
 
*IMPORTANT* Have your ticket ready to go before Saturday. 
To do this: 
1. Download the "Flash Seats" app
2. Login with the information you used to buy the ticket(s)
3. The ticket will be in the app to get into the game.
* If you do not want to do this, the debit/credit card you used to purchase the ticket(s) can be swiped when you get to the game to get in as well!
 
Contact Paul or myself with any questions :)
